articles.title: CBS cancels All Rise and The Unicorn - The A.V. Club
articles.description: All Rise and Walton Goggins' The Unicorn have both been killed off at CBS, while Chuck Lorre productions B Positive and United States Of Al both got renewals.
articles.content: Disappointing news out of CBS today, as the network announced that its canceling both its legal drama All Rise, and the increasingly satisfying second-season comedy The Unicorn. Reported by Variety, … [+1742 chars]
